More examplesFewer examplesThe psychiatric team decided that committal would not be beneficial in her case.He worked as a nurse in a psychiatric hospital.The psychiatric section is segregated from the rest of the prison.He has been transferred to a psychiatric hospital.This is an interesting psychiatric case study of a child with extreme behavioural difficulties.
